articles.author: Monica Mark, Felicia Schwartz
articles.title: US declares South African ambassador ‘persona non grata’ - Financial Times
articles.description: Secretary of state Marco Rubio expels Ebrahim Rasool after he criticised Donald Trump in an online lecture
